item.title: Men's Chorus debuts virtual choir performance
item.description:
Sing! Menâ€™s Chorus (SMC), an all-male choir in Singapore, has launched its first virtual choir project, “Why We Sing,” marking the return of arts performances in the country. The music video, available on SMC’s YouTube channel, was created over two months and conveys a message of hope: that the arts community can adapt to a new normal where the arts, especially music, are recognized for their essential role in community development...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/men-s-chorus-debuts-virtual-choir-performance/
